title: US Investment Data
description:
Description
US data for fitting an investment equation.

parameters.RealInt:
approximation to the real interest rate
(= Interest - 100 * diff(Price)/Price).
parameters.Interest:
interest rate, average yearly discount rate
charged by the New York Federal Reserve Bank,
parameters.GNP: nominal gross national product (in billion USD),
parameters.Price: price index, implicit price deflator for GNP,
parameters.Investment: nominal gross private domestic investment (in billion USD),

format: An annual time series from 1963 to 1982 with 7 variables.
